Bash(git commit -m "Reduce deaf period from 150ms to 30ms

$\(cat <<''EOF''
- 150ms was too long, missing response chirps
- 30ms is enough to block self-echo \(chirp is 80ms but detected earlier\)
- Response should arrive at ~50-100ms \(network + sound travel\)

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
